QuestData.Title: Northbound
QuestData.Description:
Da quilboar kidnapped da rest of da expedition and took dem north.
Dey said dey gonna use da expedition for some sorta sacrifice!
Ya gotta head north as fast as ya can ta stop dem!
QuestData.LogDescription: Scout northward and find Mithdran Dawntracker.
QuestData.RewardText: I have good news... and most unfortunate news.
